website_summaries.verdict: Blends seven different natural oils to deliver a pre-shave product that’s perfect for sensitive skin.
pros: Works especially well for those with coarse beards, as it softens the facial hair to prepare for a very close shave
Has skin conditioning ingredients too, helping those who suffer from razor burn
Can shave using only the oil when you’re in a hurry, rather than adding shaving foam
cons: Some users don’t like the sandalwood scent

customer_reviews.title: Misses the Mark for Me---
customer_reviews.text: Moderately dense shaving oil with little discernible fragersnce that I was able to detect. For me, the oil was possibly a little too heavy, and tended to clog up my DE razor when combined with whisker residue. The oil itself appeared to be similar to a grape seed massage oil, that I have used previously, yet at significantly higher price. While the packaging is good, the value and usefulness of this product does not drive me to recommend its purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KC Green

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Shave Oil
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pre-shave oil for my husband for Father's Day to go along with a single blade razor (old fashioned razor) and he absolutely loves this oil! Not only does it smell so fresh and wonderful, but it really helps pre-treat his face for a nice, clean shave. He barely got this out of the package before he was in the bathroom using it. His skin was so soft after his shave and the oil left a slight fragrance behind that was just refreshing. I will definitely be buying this again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie House

customer_reviews.title: Reduced cuts and razor burn with thick dense facial hair
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband. I felt like it was time for him to shave like a grownup. He followed the instructions on the bottle. The scent is very light and non intrusive. I was really worried it would be heavy and gross because he’s not much of a cologne guy. He said he really was happy with the shave and felt it was the closest he’s gotten outside of the barber shop. He has really dense facial hair and the hairs themselves are huge. I’ve never seen hair like that. He has a horrible time shaving and he cuts himself up. This has really reduced the amount of cuts and razor burn. We will be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: Not today

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommended. Update: still great!
customer_reviews.text: This works as advertised. I have a lot of razor bumps on my neck after I shave. Some of them are ingrown curly hairs and others are just irritated hair follicles or pores. Using this product before my routine shave has helped with all of those problems. The ingrown hairs still happen, which is expected as they are just curly as hell, but the irritation is much milder from them. I won't shave without it anymore, 100% recommended. Update May 2017: I'm still using Lather and Wood daily and switched to the bigger bottles. My shave bumps are few and far in between. I wouldn't shave without this product
customer_reviews.author: Arzhang Ashkan

customer_reviews.title: I had high expectations, but. . .
customer_reviews.text: I'm a self-professed shaving geek and have been for over 15 years. I don't often purchase shave oils but read a lot of reviews of this, so I decided to try. The scent is honestly not even discernible, and I don't notice any added benefit from two shave gels and lotions I used. It does have a bit of a softening effect, but I think you'd hopefully get this with any type of preshave product. I will probably try their other products, but this is something I won't purchase again. You can mix various oils and add your own essential oil for something that's fun to make--and you control the strength of the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Adam E.

customer_reviews.title: I think this stuff clogs my pores and causes massive breakouts on my neck....
customer_reviews.text: I guess it helps with a smoother shave, but even after washing my neck with a gentile soap and wash cloth after shaving and using this stuff pre-shave I experience massive skin irritation in the form of clogged and irritated pores like I have never experienced before on my neck... and I've tried to give it an honest use over the last month or 2 of shaving... Not going to continue to use... I have pretty sensitive and oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Freeze

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Oil At A Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pre-shave oil. It is not heavily scented, leaves no trace of residue and really conditions/preps the hair and skin for your shave. I will say in the past I have been a little stingy with my application, but have recently started to be a bit more liberal in my usage and the results have been excellent. You don't to have it running down your face, but I think it is best when used a bit more generously. When paired with a quality shaving soap and razor this will greatly enhance your shave!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Litten

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years and am very satisfied with it having previously tried some products from other manufacturers. An additional benefit to the bottle and pump that comes with this is the top can be easily unscrewed. This allows me to use every drop of product rather than waste the remains as was the case with some other pre-shave oils I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Ringo

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: This morning was the best shave of my life to date. I used this sandalwood pre shave oil, which smells very nice by the way, and the lather & wood shaving soap as well. My skin is very easily shredded to pieces by shaving, but this stuff helps get a super smooth shave with absolutely no razor burn. I never thought it was possible, but here it is.
customer_reviews.author: B. Michael

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Olive Oil - Very heavy Oil
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this shaving oil to have a good scent and be lighter on the face than it is. Small bottle, doesn't have much scent at all, and appears to be mostly olive oil. It feels like a heavy oil on my face and I quit using it and started making my own shaving oil. I will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter

customer_reviews.title: From Rough to Smooth Shave with this
customer_reviews.text: My first time using a pre-shave oil and when the bottle arrived a small amount had leaked from the bottle making the packaging oily. I have also seen this complaint with other brands of pre-shave oil. The reason I bought it was to make shaving my neck comfortable because for some reason the left side of my neck I get a very rough shave compared to the rest of my face and neck that I shave. BUT when I use this oil the area that is normally a rough shave is very smooth and I get a closer shave. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Spike

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but lacks in scent
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good stuff. It's a little thinner than I'm used to, but gets good coverage. I like the pump bottle - much easier than trying to pour the right amount out like with other brands. My biggest disappointment is that the Sandalwood oil doesn't really smell like Sandalwood, or anything at all, really. I'm not looking for overpowering scent, but I had to look at the bottle twice to make sure I hadn't accidentally ordered the unscented oil.
customer_reviews.author: Johannes Stauffer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product to Replace shaving cream
customer_reviews.text: I only shave my cheeks and neck because I have a beard. This is good for replacing messy shaving cream. If you shave your whole face it could get expensive. Bottle is small and the oil is a fair price, but I would use regular shaving cream for whole face. I like it and will probably buy again. I do wish the bottle was bigger.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shave, never using anything else
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd refill... this stuff is amazing. A little squirt, silky smooth shaving, NEVER any burn. Way less mess than shaving cream, this 2oz bottle lasts me over 6 months. I really like the scent, and so does my wife; shaves nice and close. Had to use shaving cream on travel recently... blech! Now I carry this in a small dropper bottle for traveling. If you've never used shave oil, you don't know what you're missing.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Cohen

customer_reviews.title: and quite enjoyed the experience
customer_reviews.text: I had a professional barber give me a straight razor shave once, and quite enjoyed the experience. It started with the hot towel and then oil was massaged into my skin. I had never thought that oil would be necessary to a nice, comfortable shave. However, it is. And this is a very good, quality oil. When I run out (and this lil bottle will last you quite a while), I will definitely be buying from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: I have recently purchased this product to try with the shave cream and after shave. This is simply outstanding. I use it after a hot wash cloth. It makes my beard far softer and easier to shave. I simply put on the small amount and rub it in completely. I then apply the shave cream and shave. It allows for a much smother and cleaner shave and the smells match perfectly as so many products do not. I will make sure to keep on hand. Thank you for a wonderful product and I will be recommending it to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: James Lee

customer_reviews.title: Smooth shave without irritation!
customer_reviews.text: This pre shave sandlewood oil works great! Better than shave butter! Hubby would always break out after shaving (especially around his lips) switched to this oil and he doesn’t break out at all anymore! The smell isn’t bad either. Awesome stuff! One bottle goes a long ways. Just wish it was more affordable and that it didn’t come in a glass bottle. The last bottle I received leaked a little bit in the shipping bag.
customer_reviews.author: samantha gilman

customer_reviews.title: New to pre-shave oils; liking this one so far!
customer_reviews.text: So I'm just diving into the world of pre-shave oils, so I don't have much to compare this to. The scent is nice, not too overpowering at all and plays well with the Taylor of Old Bond Street shaving cream I use. My first run with it, I tried out two days after my previous shave, with a new Feather double-edged blade in my razor -- typically a death sentence for my skin. Results were great, with little irritation and with a very close shave in my most troublesome spots (I have a cleft chin and that general area is always difficult). Time will tell on the value, but so far so good with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas D. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin protection
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this oil for a few years now. You'll probably need to use a some kind of foam alongside it for a good shave (I do). However, unlike a foam, what this oil really helps with is the redness and irritation (due to chlorinated water, for example) as the oil forms a sort of protective layer on the skin during shaving and this can't be compensated with by an aftershave. I'd recommend this to anyone who has skin problems after shaving despite using all kinds of shaving products.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: I want to feel a close shave every morning!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I've never use pre-shave oil before until a few weeks ago when I went to get a close shave from a barbershop. That's when I decided to buy it because I want to feel a very close shave every morning. I Google which was the best pre-shave oil in the market and yours was on the list (second to Shaveology) I decided to give a try since I love the smell of sandalwood so far is great. Thank you for a great customer service and for a wonderful product." Thanks again! Morgan Lather & Wood Shaving Co.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Leon

customer_reviews.title: Not the full ingredient list!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this based on the label shown in the listing which shows only natural ingredients. However, when the bottle arrived, I found that it contains "fragrance oil" which I am trying to avoid. Very disappointed to make a purchase decision based on a misleading listing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smoother shaving made easy
customer_reviews.text: I use this before shaving to make the shave go more smoothly. It does a great job and has a nice scent. I apply it to my dry face then splash with hot water. I then use shaving soap and brush. It all comes together for a very nice shave.
customer_reviews.author: KAAH in SC

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my hands very oily, and can barely hold ...
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my hands very oily, and can barely hold my machines after applying on client. Prefer shave gel over this.
customer_reviews.author: GonzaloTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Get a smooth, nick-free shave using Lather and Wood
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used a brush and razor for over 50 years, suffering from occasional nicks and cuts no matter what razor, soap, or amount of water used. Nearly 2 years ago a friend recommended using shaving oil before applying soap. I researched Amazon’s offerings and settled on Lather and Wood brand oil, which I’ve been using ever since. My face feels better, I almost never have cuts or nicks, and my shave is smooth. It lasts quite long - I’m just finishing my second bottle - and smells great. While I have not explored a lot of other oils, I strongly recommend Lather and Wood.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Ober

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with this Product
customer_reviews.text: I am new at “wet shaving”.....however following the instructions and applying this nice smelling oil on my face......makes my shaving experience MUCH MORE comfortable all the way around. I might add that I appreciated the customer service follow up by the vendor to insure I was happy with the product. Impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Henry Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Oily and messy
customer_reviews.text: I don't like it. You have to spend 10 minutes cleaning, after using this. Very oily. I can't spend 40 minutes to my shaving routine and therefore, I give 1 star
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: Best Shave Product Ever !
customer_reviews.text: Great product. This is my 4th purchase of this, as well as the Sandalwood Shaving Balm. The pre-shave oil truly facilitates a clean and smooth shave, while also serving to moisturize and soften the skin. Nice fragrance too .... not overwhelming but certainly adequate. Lather & Wood really got it right with this. And the seller is awesome..... emailing after each purchase to follow up with the customer to insure a positive experience.
customer_reviews.author: Duane McHan

customer_reviews.title: Gunky, sticky
customer_reviews.text: Oil's viscosity is too thick. Prevents the razor from gliding smoothly, leading to several nicks and cuts. Instead, go with American Crew Ultra Gliding Shave Oil for a smooth, unfettered shave,.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Best Shave Oil
customer_reviews.text: This product is everything it is claimed to be. It lubricates your beard so that the razor glides over your skin without the fear of nicks or cuts. AND, it doesn't irritate my sensitive skin. You can use this alone or in conjunction with a good shaving cream. Either way, my recommendation is to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Esposito

customer_reviews.title: Best pre-shave oil on the market
customer_reviews.text: I made the switch to safety razors about 4 years ago due to the cost of the more prevalent multi-blade razors. I have tried a lot of different pre-shave oils over this time and I have to say this is my absolute favorite kind. Not only does it provide the protection I need for sliding the safety razor across my face and neck, but it smells wonderful. I don’t know if I even want to try anything else after buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Uriah J.

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I've become a disciple of Lather & Wood shaving products due to their quality. The pre-shave oil gives my very sensitive skin a protective barrier for my first razor pass, which on my thick beard can be painful. No more! I use a safety razor, hence two passes (for the curious). With this stuff, one application works for me - again, just for the first pass. I recommend it to any man with sensitive skin who has discomfort when shaving, regardless of shaving style (straight, safety, cartridge).
customer_reviews.author: Tim Radle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pre-shave oil. The scent is perfect, you can’t go wrong with sandalwood. Seems a bit high on price though. Maybe most pre shave oils are. I’m not positive as to how much this really helps out during the shaving process, I just know all the advice i’ve received is that this makes a big difference for double edged razor shaving. Very good quality oil and scent.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s suppose to
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never used pre-shave oil before and this one is my very first one. So I wasn’t really sure what to expect from it. I was blown away after the first use. I couldn’t believe I was shaving for 20 years without such a great thing as pre-shave oil. I bought a bunch of Lather & Wood products at the same time and none of them disappointed me. Pre-shave oil is great, sandalwood shaving soap is just... wow. Great products overall. I’ll be buying them all again for sure
customer_reviews.author: Andriy

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this pre-shave oil
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this pre-shave oil. Great scent and gives me a close, comfortable shave. On par with that other "arty" shave products company who sells a sandalwood collection, I’m sure you know who I mean! :) But the Lather & Wood product is just as good, if not better than theirs, and more reasonably priced. Lather & Wood are going to give those guys a run for their money! When I run out of my current shave soap, I’m going to order your soap next. Thanks for your great products! I look forward to many more shaves with Lather & Wood!
customer_reviews.author: R. P. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Works well for a smooth shave for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: i use this daily as I have very sensitive skin for shaving. I found it works really well with my creamo shave cream and defender razor for a nice smooth Irritation free shave. I will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pena

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Smell just like real sandlewood! Bring me back to my childhood days to my father's woodshop! Rub the oil between your fingers and compare it to your current pre shave oil. You can truely feel the superior quality of this product! Great smell, great value, and great quality product! Would and will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Mondragon

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: There is no scent to this product and it does work in making my shaving smoother. But it is an oil and leaves a greasy residue even if you use the suggested "nickel" size in the directions. Overall underwhelming and overpriced for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Peter I. Brabson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect extra layer of lubrication!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I put on a couple of pumps before my shave cream which adds that much needed extra layer of lubrication to my shave. This pre shave oil made my daily shave 10 x better and smoother and painless! Love the scent and the product effectiveness! Don't know if I wanna shave without oil anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do much for me
customer_reviews.text: I didn't notice and improvement on my shaving experience tbh and for the amount I think its overpriced. Just simple grapeseed oil or just olive oil works the same
customer_reviews.author: Altin

customer_reviews.title: I wish I started using this 25 years ago when I first started shaving.
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 10 stars if I can, I absolutely love this product and wish I started using this 25 years ago when I first started shaving. This is the best thing any man can do for his face before he shaves, it’s not too oily and the fragrance is not too strong. The feeling after you are done shaving is priceless. I am hooked on this for the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Pin.2

customer_reviews.title: Great shave but the scent isn't very attractive
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using the pre shave oil and aftershave lotion both sandalwood scent. shaving has always been one of my least favorite things in life because of ingrown hairs and razor bumps/burn. These have helped me out a lot along switching to a single blade safety straight razor. My only complaint is that I ordered sandalwood scent and it's a very strong "Home Depot lumber section" fragrance. My girlfriend says feel free to wear it around other women because it's that unattractive! Oh well... No more skin irritation for me though.
customer_reviews.author: Keith R.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: "I have used the shaving oil. It truly is an amazing addition to my daily ritual. I use it as a pre lather oil or simply as a pre shave oil. Often in the military I have to shave very quickly. I keep some dollar shave club razors for these instances. It works miracles at the times. Obviously then when I have time and I can break out the ole faithful straight razor it makes a perfect pre lather adding that extra comfort during shave and post shave! Thanks for making this product and keeping the price so reasonable!"
customer_reviews.author: nathan moog

customer_reviews.title: Yor should skip this and buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Never had a better shave! I use it as actual shaving oil. It provides the slickest surface for my DE blade. My neck used to get chewed up by it but now, almost no irritation. I cant believe it took me so long to figure this out! I got the sandalwood scent. To me it wasn't that strong, which I prefer. Well worth the price for a beautiful face!
customer_reviews.author: Fitness skater

customer_reviews.title: Scent meh, oil decent
customer_reviews.text: Scent is rather unnoticeable but it's a good pre-shave product. If you do a full extensive two or three pass shave routine though, the shave oil scent is really nothing more than a mid routine appeasement because it's not like it will persist through the end of your routine like an aftershave
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I was using various shaving creams and multi-blade razors for a long time until the read reviews of this product and decided to give it a try. I am using this product for quite sometime and I am extremely satisfied with it. The skin remains well-hydrated and gives much smoother shave. I also purchased the the after shave, a perfect compliment to this amazing product! I would definitely recommend this product to everyone...
customer_reviews.author: John Maliparambil

customer_reviews.title: This helps avoid cuts
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this product and it makes a big difference in preventing the small little cuts from shaving. When I forget to use it, it was a recent addition to my routine, I can tell the blade does not glide as smoothly across my skin. Great scent and it goes great with their post shave lotion as well. Great product and lets you keep the blood where it belongs.....on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Coonts

customer_reviews.title: CLOSER SHAVE
customer_reviews.text: Not only am I getting a comfortable shave, but it is a closer shave than any other products that I have used in 50 years of shaving. Your product results in a smoother shave.

customer_reviews.title: Best Pre-shave oil. Would be a great option for backpacking.
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite pre-shave oil ever invented. I would highly recommend. It prepares my face perfectly for my straight razor shaves. I use shaving cream as well. But you could definitely just use this for backpacking.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron King

customer_reviews.title: Smooth feel quality bottle

All in all it is a great product and I will be keeping it in stock at my house.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer will keep on buying this product!

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product
customer_reviews.text: I use shave oil in my travel bag and when traveling in our motor home. This is the 3rd brand I have tried and it is so much better than the others. No shave cream, only the oil and the shave is very close and no irritation. Will order it again.

customer_reviews.title: Feels good.  Smells like food-grade oil.

But it's not very redolent of sandalwood, as the description led me to expect.
customer_reviews.author: Milos Enron

customer_reviews.title: The product has a great sandalwood smell

customer_reviews.author: Andrew Loposser

customer_reviews.title: Shaving Routine Staple!

customer_reviews.title: Great Oil. Works really well.

customer_reviews.title: 3-Day Beard Guy Turned Every-Day Face Shaver
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I never used to be able to shave without irritation. I'd tried every shaving cream, razor, and alcohol-based pre-shave under the sun. customer_reviews.author: Pat W.

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable shaving comfort!
customer_reviews.text: This was a very recent purchase teamed with Feather safety razor double-edged blades. The Pre-Shaving Oil did a great job of lubricating my skin and prepping my beard. My shave is so smooth, Between a new level of caution is required to ensure I don't nick myself!

customer_reviews.title: This is great stuff. I’m new to wet shaving and I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff. I’m new to wet shaving and I can really tell the difference when I use this before shaving. This helps you get a smooth shave and really cuts down on the irritation and razor burn. Highly recommend. Customer service is 2nd to none with this company. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Markren

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative
customer_reviews.text: I have used the sandalwood pre-shave oil from Art of Shaving for a number of years. And it was good, this measures up in every way. Although I will say the fragrance is slightly different from the Art of Shaving but in no way does that influence its use or desirability.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, great service!
customer_reviews.text: Fairly new to wet shaving and thought I'd try this product. It has a nice sandalwood scent that is not overpowering. it's one of the best preshave oil's I've tried so far. A company rep had contacted me after I'd bought it asking how I liked it. I had a small problem with the product when I first got it, but they more than fairly sorted it out for me. The product is pretty good, but the customer service is even better.
customer_reviews.author: AndyB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pre-shave oil
customer_reviews.text: Oil smells good and makes shaving process smoother and more satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: trypolskyi

customer_reviews.title: Good product but SMALL
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is nice and I would keep using it but the bottle is SO tiny. It really is only good for <10 uses. Not worth the price, I won't be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Made my shaving painless and effortless. Apply on areas ...
customer_reviews.text: Made my shaving painless and effortless. Apply on areas intended to shave. Wet the areas with warm water. Give at least 2 minutes. I brush my teeth that time. Shave. No redness, pain, irritation and will give closer shave. And the scent will linger.
customer_reviews.author: suni

customer_reviews.title: A SMOOTHER SHAVE.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time that I have purchased this shaving oil. I think that says it all." I have shaved using this oool and not using it. When shaving with this oil the blade flows so much smoother and I get closer shave. I highly recommend this shaving oil. The price is a great value as well.
customer_reviews.author: 2winelovers

customer_reviews.title: A very good shaving oil
customer_reviews.text: A very good shaving oil. I have been using various shaving oils for about 10 years now, and this compares with the best amongst the ones I have used. Having a the sandalwood fragrance worked better than I had expected! And the larger size is also a great convenience. The only minor 'nitpick' I have is that the oil is slightly thicker than I would like, but only slightly so.
customer_reviews.author: OldSlick

customer_reviews.title: Bottle leaks during shipping. Can’t use for travel.
customer_reviews.text: This product leaks from the bottle. Upon delivery the whole exterior of the bottle was oily and the bag it came it was oily on the inside. The scent is ok, but the fact that the bottle leaks makes it a poor purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: You need this product in your life
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big fan of the combo of this shaving oil with the accompanying shaving soap. Whips up a nice thick and very slick lather with very little effort. Customer service is top notch and made in Seattle to boot. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Galvin

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I used this after shave and just tried this pre-shave oil today. The oil definitely seemed to help me. This was only my third shave using a Safety Razor, and the first two shaves were definitely not a great experience. Not sure if its my technique getting better or this oil, or a mixture of both, but either way I got a close shave today with no burning sensation or nicks. I believe this oil plays a big part, so thanks alot!
customer_reviews.author: fo

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this was a lot for such a tiny bottle, but it’s lasted me a year. Effective product, I just wish the scent was stronger and lingering but that’s my personal preference. Great oil though. No breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: John M Scott

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for about almost 2 years, I’ve tried everything else and nothing compares to this I’m happy with the end results. I use the pre shave oil for my face and head it allows me for a close up shave by softening the hair. My only dislike is I wish it comes in a bigger bottle.
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: A Little Expensive, But...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several pre-shave oils and like this one best. It's a little more expensive, but I guess you get what you pay for. I would love if they would offer a cheaper version in a plastic bottle. I don't need to pay for the glass bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Pifemaster

customer_reviews.title: The end of shaving irritation
customer_reviews.text: This oil makes for an extremely comfortable shave. Wonderful aroma, Great slickness, and no irritation (especially when paired with the sandalwood shave soap). This will be a mainstay in my shaving routine from here on out for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick W. McHugh

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but has improved my shaves
customer_reviews.text: First let me say that I have very sensitive skin and I have to shave daily. This pre-shave oil has made my shaves amazing! I have definitely noticed a lot less irritation and no cuts! It is a little on the pricey side but is beyond worth it for my shaves. Also, I have had a great experience dealing with Lather & Wood in the past.
customer_reviews.author: what's this

customer_reviews.title: An excellent pre-shave oil
customer_reviews.text: An excellent pre-shave oil. Not sticky and it is slick and comforting. Just use a modest amount and rub gently into the beard. Sets up the bead for a great shave. I use this with Art of Shaving shaving cream, using a brush for the shaving cream.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. D'Alesio Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Scent
customer_reviews.text: I'm not certain if this does any real good but I love the scent and it certainly doesn't hurt! I look forward to using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeter Creek

customer_reviews.title: A great addition for a close shave
customer_reviews.text: This was one of this things I always thought was unnecessary but after using I’m hooked. Helps give you a great close shave and greatly reduces razor bumps and ingrown hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's ok. A bit thin, much more so ...
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. A bit thin, much more so than Taylor of old Bond street version, hence it wont last as long.It also doesn't really hold up to the lather well, therefore it provides little in the way of extra lubrication. Also the scent is barely detectable. If I had wanted an unscented Pre-shave oil, I would have ordered one. I'll be going back to TOBS once it's gone.
customer_reviews.author: Swissbuddha

customer_reviews.title: Nice choice if you're looking for a good pre-shave oil
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a huge user of pre-shave oil, but if I use one it’s normally this. Good initial scent and convenient pump dispenser really make this nice. Does not have what I would call a lingering scent when used with similar scented soap or cream, but leaves a decent trace when used alone with a blade. Since it doesn’t take much when applied, this bottle will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: AMD1214

customer_reviews.title: I liked the pump mechanism as it was easier to control ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the pump mechanism as it was easier to control the amount dispensed than other pre-shave oils I have used. The oil itself seemed to be only marginally helpful at best, but to be honest it was difficult to determine if it made any real difference relative to using shaving cream alone (Old Taylor of Bond Street). Moreover, the scent was barely noticeable; and certainly did not smell of sandalwood. Although there was nothing wrong with the product, I'll be trying other oils in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Good product noticed my shave was a tad bit smoother ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product noticed my shave was a tad bit smoother nothing to write home about however. I was hoping this would help with my neck sensitivity a little bit more then it did. Also I noticed this product is not very strong smelling at all. All and all I do not think its bad for the price however I do think I will try other products .
customer_reviews.author: Nic H

customer_reviews.title: Works very well. Packaging needs work.
customer_reviews.text: It goes on smooth and prepares my beard for an easy shave. The scent is not overpowering. I would give a higher review if the item wasn't leaking in the package on my recorder of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dad loved it
customer_reviews.text: My dad said this is the only preshave cream that ever actually improved his shaving experience. It’s a win!
customer_reviews.author: Bethanie H.

customer_reviews.title: An essential for all who shave
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to post shaving balm. Perfect travel size, great scent that isn't overpowering and leaves my skin healthy after a shave.
customer_reviews.author: Mboci

customer_reviews.title: Left skin smoother and softer
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this on my head and my face to shave. Seems to leave my skin smoother and softer afterwards. This is my first pre shave oil I’ve tried. So I may try another one next
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Good pre-shave oil
customer_reviews.text: This product works as described. I have other products from lather and wood, so this seemed like a god fit since I have been enjoying the others. I like the sandalwood scent but I do think it is a little weak. The only thing I would change it make it a little stronger scented.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Gore

customer_reviews.title: If you haven't tried pre-shave oil, you really should ...
customer_reviews.text: If you haven't tried pre-shave oil, you really should. It seems to help the razor glide a little more smoothly, which gets you a smoother shave with less irritation. It lasts a long time since you only need a tiny bit. First wet your face with the hottest water you can stand, then get a squirt or two of the oil, and massage it into your scruff. Then put your shaving cream on directly on top of the oil, and have at it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Schrader

customer_reviews.title: Great, long lasting scent. Makes face feel amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best aftershave balm I’ve ever used. The scent is amazing and lasts all day. I can still smell it when I get ready for bed. Just two pumps is all I need. I will never go back to alcohol based aftershaves.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I guess it worked. I've never used a pre shave oil before but it felt like I was just smearing olive oil on my face that smelled like sandalwood.
customer_reviews.author: KerryAnn

customer_reviews.title: Kind of a novelty at best.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t try and use this by itself for shaving. Smells and feels nice though.

customer_reviews.title: Generally works
customer_reviews.text: In Mediterranean summer with its high humidity when my face skin is sweaty I use it to get the close shave with my Panasonic. It does the job but the smell is not so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Alex L.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Scent does not overwhelm the shave soap. Definitely makes for a soft shave usinga straight.

customer_reviews.author: Marcos Volao

customer_reviews.title: Try it!  You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic pre-shave oil. It has really increased my enjoyment of shaving. I have a pretty coarse beard and sensitive skin, so this oil has helped tremendously. The seller is very friendly and really went the extra mile for me. I'll definitely be purchasing again, soon.
